The screenshot was shared in a blog post: 2020, which claimed to be from GMA News, a Philippine media organization.
The screenshot showed a text overlay sta: FAKE BOOKINGS: DELIVERY DRIVER DID NOT EXPECT TO BE DELIVERING SEVERED HEAD! POLICE ON THE HUNT FOR SENDER!"
A reverse image search on Google reveale: 2020, but the text overlay had been digitally altered to include the reference to the severed head. The original text stated, "FAKE BOOKINGS: SOME FOOD DELIVERY DRIVERS VICTIMIZED BY FAKE BOOKINGS OF PEOPLE WHO COULD NOT BE FOUND."
